title: How to start rapping and dancing - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't know much about how you can start rapping but there are tons of instructional or educational videos on youtube for rapping. I’ve been dancing hip hop for a few years now and I'm guessing you don't have access to dance studios or rooms like that, so just start by learning a few Kpop dances that really interest you and after you've learnt and danced to it a couple of times record yourself and correct any mistakes and repeat the process. Even if it may seem hard, with every mistake you make and correct, you are learning something new and getting better at dancing. Start by easier girl group dances if you’re really new and as you get better go for more intermediate dances.

Practice tongue twisters. They help with pronunciation to make sure that when you speak fast that people can also understand you. Search up some Eminem and Nicki Minaj, too. For dancing, improve your flexibility and athletic attributes. Make sure your body is strong enough to be dancing for a long period of time. Search up some dance routines and choreography.
